title: Fact Check: Fake tweet of MNS Chief Raj Thackeray supporting Kangana Ranaut goes viral | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A screenshot of a tweet attributed to MNS chief Raj Thackeray is being shared on social media.

The tweet is making rounds in the backdrop of a bitter faceoff between Bollywood actor Kangana Ranaut and Senior Shiv Sena leader and Rajya Sabha MP Sanjay Raut.

(English Translation: Kangana Ranaut will be given a grand welcome in Maharashtra’s capital Mumbai on September 9. Sanjay Raut, Stop her if you can.)

 



At the time of filing this report, the above post had more than 1,000 shares on Facebook.

Similar posts can be seen here and here.

NewsMobile fact-checked the post and found that it is being falsely attributed to Raj Thackeray.

We checked the Twitter handle that posted the tweet. We found that the tweet was made from an unverified account.

While investigating, we also noticed that the user changed the user handle from @RealThackeray (as seen in the screenshot) to @TheThackerayRaj. However, all the replies made to the tweet, before the handle name was changed, were still the old one, which is, @RealThackeray. This proves that both of these are the same account.

Moreover, the official verified handle of Raj Thackeray is @RajThackeray and we did not find any such tweet on his official Twitter handle.

The above information proves that the tweet going viral was made from a fake account. Hence, the post in question is false.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
